Chanzo Limited was awarded a £300,620 contract for human resources services by the Department of Health and Social Care.
Jean Tomlin is the majority owner of Chanzo Limited.

Jean Tomlin and Paul Deighton have close professional ties: they worked together on the organising committee for the 2012 Olympic Games in London, they are both directors of strategic advisory firm Hakluyt & Company, and Chanzo's website features a glowing endorsement of Tomlin by Deighton.
Deighton was nominated to the House of Lords and appointed as Commercial Secretary to the Treasury by David Cameron.
Honeywell Safety Products was awarded a £58 million contract to provide PPE for the Department of Health and Social Care.
Paul Deighton holds shares in Honeywell International, whose subsidiary Honeywell Safety Products was awarded a large PPE contract while Deighton served as the government's "PPE tsar".
Chohan was one of the Tory donors that funded £12,500 worth of food deliveries to Boris and Carrie Johnson during the pandemic.
Dido Harding is on the board of the Jockey Club.
The Jockey Club runs the Grand National.
Randox has been the headline sponsor of the Grand National since 2017.
Matt Hancock's constituency of Newmarket is the seat of the Jockey Club.
Rose Paterson was married to Owen Paterson.
Rose Paterson's brother is Matt Ridley.
Rose Paterson became chair of the Jockey Club in 2014 and was appointed a member of the board of stewards in 2019.
